overview: Omar Ibn Al-Hajj Mukhtar disappears in mysterious circumstances, and his father remains sure that he is alive, and asks the family and all the people in the neighborhood to search for him, and when he meets a young man named Omar, he thinks that he is his son, but his eldest daughter discovers the truth and Omar's death years ago, everyone sympathizes with Hajj Mukhtar and with his missing paternity.
title: Half a day
